name: The Time Machine (Karma)
description:
This is my second semester project at University of Applied sciences Hamburg

We have created a 3d Walking Sim/Platformer based on the book and movie "The Time Machine" with a minimalist art style inspired by The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker and SuperHot 

In the game, you are the time traveler and in an attempt to escape danger, your time machine has malfunctioned and taken you to an unknown place and time, you must search for the pieces of your time machine to repair it and continue on your adventure!

Team and contribution:

Karam (Karma) Hamadeh: Coding and implementation

Jacob Andrews: Project manager and 3d artist

Sunil Horse: 3d and 2d art

Any feedback would be much appreciated!
